paramInformation.label: LED Light
paramInformation.description: LED status when device on or off.

options.label: LED on when load is off
LED on when light is turned on
Press any button on the switch
Press on two times, then off two times

metadata.inclusion: Press and release the manual/program button on the smart switch.
metadata.exclusion: Press and release the manual/program button on the smart switch.
metadata.reset:
1. If plugged in, unplug the device from the receptacle
2. Press and hold the manual/program button, plug the device in and continue to hold for at least 3 seconds
